name: Soupor - Paint Jam 2021
description:
Fullscreen recommended

Description:

Join Soupor on his quest to escape the supermarket and defeat the underpaid, overworked, unnamed cashier before your expiration date on this platformer with metroidvania elements!

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button to attack

Right Mouse Button to dash(after unlocking the bean powerup)

Attack beige blocks or spikes to propel yourself into the opposite direction

Powerups:

Can - Allows travelling on the soda rivers

Carrot - Enhances eyesight on the dark

Bean - Drastically increases speed and allows using the dash

Spork - Allows the destruction of spaghetti walls.
